reviewtext: I have never been one to keep up with the Jones so when this price was offered I snagged two of these.Always have power outages in Tucson and if I forget to turn off coffee pot during one I lose my coffee maker when power comes back on. That had me concerned about computer and TV set up. Have not had power out since getting these but it was wonderful to solve the problem of which cord was plugged in where.
summary: Just what we were looking for.
